bug.author: florianspy
bug.summary: when calling the convert function the following way python3 -c "from models import *; convert('yolov3.cfg','yolov3.weights')" errorValueError: unsupported format character ''' (0x27) at index 29 occures
bug.description:
This bug can be fixed by changing line 441 in file models.py from <denchmark-code> print("Success: converted '%s' to '%'" % (weights, target)) </denchmark-code>
to <denchmark-code> print("Success: converted '%s' to '%s'" % (weights, target)) </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/florianspy>@florianspy</denchmark-link> , thank you for your interest in our work! Please visit our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Training Tutorial</denchmark-link> to get started, and see our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/blob/master/tutorial.ipynb>Google Colab Notebook</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov3>Docker Image</denchmark-link> , and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/GCP-Quickstart>GCP Quickstart Guide</denchmark-link> for example environments. If this is a bug report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/florianspy>@florianspy</denchmark-link> thank you for the bug report! Weâ€™ve committed a fix for this now. Please reopen if the problem continues.
